p: As presented in table 3, the analysis of ANOVA showed no significant difference for the serum MDA among different groups (P=0.43). Reserpine increased serum MDA compared with that of the control group, but not significantly (P=0.43). The use of fluoxetine or Marze essential oil at different concentrations decreased the reserpine-induced increase in the serum MDA, but these changes were not significant (P=0.43).
